summary.span: Use el elemento CallTarget en el archivo de proyecto para crear y ejecutar esta tarea.

span.span: Use the CallTarget element in your project file to create and execute this task.

summary.span: Indica al motor de [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] que compile uno o varios destinos en el proyecto actual.

span.span: Instructs the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] engine to build one or more targets in the current project.

returns.span: si todos los destinos se compilan correctamente; de lo contrario, .

span.span: if all targets built successfully; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RunEachTargetSeparately { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: Obtiene o establece un valor booleano que indica si se llama al motor de [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] una vez por destino () o si se llama una vez al motor de [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] para compilar todos los destinos ().

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] engine is called once per target () or the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] engine is called once to build all targets ().

value.span: Si el [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] motor se llama una vez por destino; si el [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] motor se llama una vez para compilar todos los destinos.

span.span: if the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] engine is called once per target; if the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] engine is called once to build all targets.

summary.span: Obtiene o establece un valor booleano que indica si el motor de MSBuild devolverá los destinos generados desde la memoria caché.

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the MSBuild engine will return the built targets from the cache.

value.span: Es si el motor de MSBuild devolverá los destinos generados desde la memoria caché; de lo contrario, es .

span.span: if the MSBuild engine will return the built targets from the cache; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks El ámbito de los destinos compilados en la memoria caché es (ProjectFileName, propiedadesGlobales) [nombresDeDestino] como una lista de elementos de compilación.The scope of built targets in the cash is (ProjectFileName, GlobalProperties)[TargetNames] as a list of build items.
